programme.desc: Emeril shares his savory wild mushroom ragout over creamy stone-ground grits. Plus, Emeril's rich and delicious porcini risotto with truffle oil

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Embrace autumn with Emeril's sweet and savory apple recipes: apple cider-braised chicken with cabbage and homemade applesauce and warm apple fritters

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.sub-title: Coffee: Sneaky Flavor Enhancer in Savory Dishes
programme.desc: Emeril prepares coffee-infused recipes: short ribs, ancho chiles with Parmesan polenta, and espresso and cocoa-rubbed flank steak with blood orange and plum salad

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril's Restaurant in New Orleans recipes: quail Milton with wild mushroom-andouille duxelles and banana-cream pie

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Join Emeril for a Mexican birthday fiesta! Classic frozen Margaritas and chorizo, cheese, and green chile enchiladas. Plus, a sopapillas, traditional Mexican dessert

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: If you're searching for a satisfying, no-fuss dinner, look no further than Emeril's one-pot wonder, coq au vin blanc. Plus, French classic leek and bacon quiche

programme.title: Emeril_Cooks
programme.sub-title: Emeril Cooks with Lindsey Brower, Nan Wallis
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friends Lindsey Brower and Nan Wallis as they create a mouth-watering meal inspired by locally brewed sake.

programme.title: Emeril_Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Justin Kennedy of Parkway Bakery and Tavern as they explore a menu filled with classic New Orleans sandwiches. Emeril will make everything from the classic Po' boy to the Muffuletta.

programme.title: Emeril_Cooks
programme.sub-title: Emeril Cooks with Asia Magree, Chassidy Carter
programme.desc: Join Emeril and interns Asia Magee and Chassidy Carter as they take on the dishes made at Cafe Reconcile. Get ready to try Emeril's classic Crab Cakes, Fried Green Tomatoes, and Pineapple Cornbread.

programme.title: Emeril_Cooks
programme.sub-title: Emeril Cooks with Juwan Johnson, Chanen Johnson
programme.desc: Join Emeril as he shows New Orleans Saints player Juwan Johnson and his wife Chanen how to prepare a classic Big Easy dinner.

programme.title: Emeril_Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his dear friend Chef Aaron Sanchez as they explore a menu inspired by a trip to Cuba: Cuban-Style Picadillo and Sweet Potato Casserole, Arroz con Puerco, and, of course, Croquetas.

programme.title: Emeril_Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and Chef Shermond Esteen as they explore a menu inspired by Shermond's restaurant brunch menu. Get ready to try Eggs Florentine, Potato Cakes and Mornay Sauce, and Bread Pudding with Rum Sauce.
